game.name: Potion Knight
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound
game.shortDescription: Potion Knight is an intense and up-tempo first-person shooter that combines the need for speed with tactical potion throwing. Set in the harsh snow ridden village of Cronenberg where an unorthodox alchemist has been fusing animals with weapons to fight under his command.
